service-account.description: The name of the service account to be created and the namespace in which the service account is to be created.
service-account.title: Service Account

secret-spark-properties.description: The name of the Spark Properties secret to use. The secret contains [spark-properties], which is the list of different Spark properties that are associated with this service account.
secret-spark-properties.title: Spark Properties Secret Name

description: The schema for the provider side of this interface.
title: ProviderSchema
